cancel-btn-props.description: Customize the props of the cancel button, with optional values consistent with the Button component
cancel-btn-props.description_zh: 自定义取消按钮的 props ，可选值与 Button 组件一致

cancel-content.description: Customize the content of the cancel button

confirm-btn-props.description: Customize the confirmation button props, with optional values consistent with the Button component
confirm-btn-props.description_zh: 自定义确认按钮 props，可选值与 Button 组件一致

confirm-content.description: Customize the content of the confirmation button

duration.description: The delay of auto-shutdown is only valid if the type is 'message'
duration.description_zh: 自动关闭的延时，仅当 type 为 'message' 有效

esc-closable.description: Whether to allow pressing the Esc key to close the window
esc-closable.description_zh: 是否允许按 Esc 键关闭窗口

footer-dragable.description: The bottom of the control can be dragged

fullscreen.description: Whether or not to maximize the display

id.description: If you don't want the window to be clicked repeatedly, you can set a unique ID to prevent repeated prompts, only if the type is 'message'
id.description_zh: 如果不想窗口重复点击，可以设置唯一的 id 防止重复提示，仅当 type 为 'message' 有效

is-form-reset.description: When the pop-up window is closed, whether to reset the form data
is-form-reset.description_zh: 关闭弹窗时，是否重置表单数据

lock-scroll.description: Whether to lock the scroll bar and not allow the page to scroll
lock-scroll.description_zh: 是否锁住滚动条，不允许页面滚动

lock-view.description: Whether to lock the page and not allow any operation outside the window
lock-view.description_zh: 是否锁住页面，不允许窗口之外的任何操作

mask.description: Whether or not to display the mask layer

mask-closable.description: Whether to allow clicking on the mask layer to close the window
mask-closable.description_zh: 是否允许点击遮罩层关闭窗口

message-closable.description: 'message' 类型弹窗是否显示关闭按钮
message-closable.description_zh: 'message' 类型弹窗是否显示关闭按钮

min-height.description: The minimum height of the window

min-width.description: The minimum width of the window

v-model.description: Whether it is displayed or not

resize.description: Whether to allow dragging to resize the window
resize.description_zh: 是否允许拖动调整窗口大小

show-footer.description: Whether or not to show the bottom

show-header.description: Whether or not to show the head

status.description: 消息状态，当 type 为 'alert'、'message'、'confirm' 时有效
status.description_zh: 消息状态，当 type 为 'alert'、'message'、'confirm' 时有效

top.description: The position of the message from the top, only valid if the type is 'message'
top.description_zh: 消息距离顶部的位置，仅当 type 为 'message' 时有效

width.description: The width of the window (set the width in pixels or percentages, and the browser window size can be centered when the size of the browser window changes)
width.description_zh: 窗口的宽度（设置宽度像素或者百分比，浏览器窗口大小改变可居中显示)

:z-index.description: Custom stacking order (may be used for some special scenes, such as when occluded)
:z-index.description_zh: 自定义堆叠顺序（对于某些特殊场景，比如被遮挡时可能会用到）

events.name: cancel
events.description: The event is triggered when the cancel button is clicked
events.description_zh: 点击取消按钮时会触发该事件

events.name: close
events.description: The event is triggered when the close button is clicked
events.description_zh: 点击关闭按钮时会触发该事件

events.name: confirm
events.description: The event is triggered when the OK button is clicked
events.description_zh: 点击确定按钮时会触发该事件

events.name: hide
events.description: This event is triggered when the window is closed
events.description_zh: 在窗口关闭时会触发该事件

events.name: show
events.description: This event is triggered when the window is displayed
events.description_zh: 在窗口显示时会触发该事件

events.name: zoom
events.description: This event is triggered when the window zooms
events.description_zh: 窗口缩放时会触发该事件

slots.name: footer
slots.description: Template at the bottom of the window
